Header: Kuliyapitiya youth allegedly attacked with sword
Content: An individual has been killed in the Apaladeniya area in Kuliyapitiya. It is learnt that a sword has been used in the killing. Police say the alleged killing occurred at around 10.30 on  Friday night. The victim was a 29-year old resident of Kuliyapitiya. It is learnt that the alleged killing took place due to a personal dispute. Police stated  that necessary measures are being taken to arrest the suspect who had fled the area.
